format: A data frame with 1028 observations on the following variable.
title: Nuclear Arms Reduction Survey
description:
Description
A simple random sample of 1,028 US adults in March 2013 found that 56\
support nuclear arms reduction.
reference:
Gallup report: In U.S., 56 percent Favor U.S.-Russian Nuclear Arms Reductions.
Available at https://news.gallup.com/poll/161198/favor-russian-nuclear-arms-reductions.aspx.
